original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord, according to all that his father Amaziah had done.
korean_text: 아사랴가 그의 아버지 아마샤의 모든 행위대로 여호와 보시기에 정직히 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 주의 보시기에 옳은 일을 행했습니다.

sentences.original_text: according to all that his father Amaziah had done.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 아마샤가 행했던 모든 것에 따라.
